description: By hiring Nathan Hubbard, Twitter seeks to make revenue.
contenttemplated:
[{"type":"text/html","content":"

Twitter has hired the former CEO of Ticketmaster. What can the head of a ticketing behemoth offer a social media company that's yet to go public? In a word -- commerce. Ticketmaster's Nathan Hubbard helped his old employer dominate online. So his new job could be to help Twitter turn a big user base into some dollar bills. Marketplace Tech reporter Queena Kim has the latest on the story.

"}]
itags: Marketplace Morning Report for Thursday, August 29, 2013
teaser: By hiring Nathan Hubbard, Twitter seeks to make revenue.
contentencoded: Twitter has hired the former CEO of Ticketmaster. What can the head of a ticketing behemoth offer a social media company that's yet to go public? In a word -- commerce. Ticketmaster's Nathan Hubbard helped his old employer dominate online. So his new job could be to help Twitter turn a big user base into some dollar bills. Marketplace Tech reporter Queena Kim has the latest on the story.
title: Can Ticketmaster's former CEO help Twitter make big bucks?
